ygData.subject: Re: Harmonic and the future.
ygData.msgSnippet: heh, thanks for the sentiment, but I am not quitting yet. That was Harmonic s post :) ... ______________________________________________________ Get Your
ygData.messageBody:
heh, thanks for the sentiment, but I am not quitting yet. That was
Harmonic's post :)


>From: Maxamillian Sterling <darktek13@...>
>Reply-To: eqbards@onelist.com
>To: eqbards@onelist.com
>Subject: Re: [eqbards] Harmonic and the future.
>Date: Wed, 23 Feb 2000 14:32:26 -0800 (PST)
>
>Rokenn,
>
>You may want to consider logging in and only playing
>for an hour or two. I know at the higher levels, list
>wait times stretch much longer than the hour or two
>that you are playing, but atleast you can hop in and
>say hi. Maybe help acouple of people out ect.
>
>If nothing else, please keep your web site updated. I
>check your site ever day and find the information
>invaulable. I wish you the best and please do not be a
>stranger.
>
>-Sing
>
> First of all, I'm still around, I read you all
> > everyday. =D
> > >
> > > I haven't played Everquest in about 2 weeks now.
> > I may not
> > > play Everquest again. In short, the game was
> > taking away time
> > > I needed to spend working and most importantly
> > taking care of
> > > my girlfriend. For almost 14 months (since beta
> > 3) she has
> > > endured 6-8 hour sessions of EQ on a daily
> > basis. Clearly,
> > > the game came before she did in all cases.
> > >
> > > Everquest wasn't that great either, I know I
> > complained about
> > > it often, but I'd keep coming back for the
> > people when I could
> > > have turned and looked 5 feet beside me and
> > spent time with
> > > that one person who counted. Everquest/Verant
> > are full of
> > > shortcomings and I kept hoping that things would
> > finally get
> > > 'fixed' or 'work properly' - but that was just a
> > dream.
> > >
> > > I want to play again, just not now. Things are
> > going very well
> > > right now and I don't want to bring back the
> > frustration that EQ
> > > caused me. I'll read the posts here where
> > relevant, but I won't
> > > post much. I've got big work projects demanding
> > more and more
> > > time. I've also got a kitten and a beautiful
> > girlfriend demanding
> > > more time as well. There's no way I'm going to
> > return and play the
> > > length of time I once played. But I hope to
> > return soon, maybe in
> > > a few more weeks.
>
>
>__________________________________________________
